about_info.title: Who I am ?
about_info.body: I am Reyaz Ahmad, Android developer with 3 years of industry experience with Mavenhive Technologies, Navi Technologies and Saveo Healthtech Pvt. Ltd.

about_info.title: My Education
about_info.body: Completed my Bachelors in Computer Science & Engineering between 2015 and 2019 from MVJ College of Engineering, Bangalore (VTU)
